item.title: Need Help with my first WC script
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

[scar]program edgeywillowcutter;
var x,y,cut,bank:integer;
const
tree1=3752249;
tree2=2175025;
tree3=3764579;
Bankbooth=9211540; //this is the glass part of the booth
Log1=2183514;
Log2=2184538;
//minimap colors
Banklogo=54276151;
plant=3762498; //the plant nearest the tree

procedure cutniggacut;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(cut,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure findwillow;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,plant,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;
procedure findbank;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,banklogo,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure bankem;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
Begin;
cut:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DA3330A03E70357735’ +
‘7771452649D5656861E86C60E0E2EAE2E462062189D26500D205D’ +
‘10B01C86C5C7A813600CD87E825D58F03A2D709A8171C26F87D47’ +
‘5DBD1080192310332124A92620C7F56000008E0E9D74’);

bank:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DAC592410E0321084’ +
‘5AF044CA3CE56FDDCFF4855999936B69AA62E0612167E1FC12F44’ +
‘AB91917D7656FF506346428A094C3547AAB090F0EF2A14115A541’ +
‘DB0659E17CBA153B5752E2C879A5F591DCC3C63DD8C85C7067FB1’ +
‘E90EF6D30D0B53CDB177FFBB1F7CF0704FEC8EF5B9283D4F64972’ +
‘0FB7CD3ACFF519BB7C2F5A52D693D9E7DDBA5B0’);
end;

begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
findwillow;
wait(1000+random(1000));
cutniggacut;
until(false)
findbank;
wait(1000+random(1000));
bankem;
end.[/scar]

Ok what you did was put begin and end in your main loop. You don’t need to do that before and after procedures. Just one begin and one end. Also, you shouldn’t put a ; after begin. It messes things up sometimes. Look at what I did to trim down your main loop (you know what that is right?).

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help with my first WC script

item.title: Need Help with my first WC script
item.dc:creator: @IheartMaryJane IheartMaryJane
item.description:
@IheartMaryJane wrote:

ok this is what i got so far and i need help getting it to actually work

[scar]program edgeywillowcutter;
var x,y,cut,bank:integer;
const
tree1=3752249;
tree2=2175025;
tree3=3764579;
Bankbooth=9211540; //this is the glass part of the booth
Log1=2183514;
Log2=2184538;
//minimap colors
Banklogo=54276151;
plant=3762498; //the plant nearest the tree

procedure cutniggacut;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,tree1,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(cut,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure findwillow;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,plant,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;
procedure findbank;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,banklogo,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure bankem;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,bankbooth,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
wait(1000+random(500))
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
Begin;
cut:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DA3330A03E70357735’ +
‘7771452649D5656861E86C60E0E2EAE2E462062189D26500D205D’ +
‘10B01C86C5C7A813600CD87E825D58F03A2D709A8171C26F87D47’ +
‘5DBD1080192310332124A92620C7F56000008E0E9D74’);

bank:= BitmapFromString(10, 13, ‘z78DAC592410E0321084’ +
‘5AF044CA3CE56FDDCFF4855999936B69AA62E0612167E1FC12F44’ +
‘AB91917D7656FF506346428A094C3547AAB090F0EF2A14115A541’ +
‘DB0659E17CBA153B5752E2C879A5F591DCC3C63DD8C85C7067FB1’ +
‘E90EF6D30D0B53CDB177FFBB1F7CF0704FEC8EF5B9283D4F64972’ +
‘0FB7CD3ACFF519BB7C2F5A52D693D9E7DDBA5B0’);
end;
begin;
loadbitmaps;
repeat
begin;
findwillow;
end;
begin;
cutniggacut;
until(false)
end;
begin;
findbank;
end;
begin;
bankem;
end.
begin
end.[/scar]

please dont yell at me for being such a scripting noob i just need to know how to get it to work
